article.title: Canterbury_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: Canterburyis a city located in the county of Kent in southeast England. It may also refer to:
article.heading: Places
In Australia

list.listitem: Canterbury, New South Wales, a suburb of SydneyElectoral district of Canterbury, an electoral district in the New South Wales Legislative AssemblyCity of Canterbury, New South Wales, a local government area of Sydney
Canterbury, Queensland, a small settlement
Canterbury, Victoria, a suburb of Melbourne

article.heading: In Canada

list.listitem: Canterbury, New Brunswick, a village
Canterbury Falls, Ancaster, Ontario

article.heading: In New Zealand

list.listitem: Canterbury, New Zealand, a region in the South Island of New Zealand
Canterbury Province, a former province of New Zealand
Canterbury Bight, a stretch of coastline

article.heading: In the United Kingdom

list.listitem: City of Canterbury, the local government district in Kent
Province of Canterbury, one of two ecclesiastical provinces which constitute the Church of England
Diocese of Canterbury, a Church of England diocese
Oriel Square, formerly Canterbury Square, Oxford

article.heading: In the United States

list.listitem: Canterbury, Connecticut, a town
Canterbury, Delaware, an unincorporated community
Canterbury, New Hampshire, a town
Canterbury, West Virginia, an unincorporated community

article.heading: Elsewhere

list.listitem: Canterbury, Jamaica, a squatter suburb ofMontego Bay
Canterbury Spur, Marie Byrd Land, Antarctica
3563 Canterbury, an asteroid

article.heading: Education

list.listitem: University of Canterbury, Christchurch, New Zealand
Canterbury College (disambiguation), a number of colleges named thus
Canterbury High School (disambiguation), numerous high schools named thus
Canterbury University (Seychelles), unaccredited institution in the Seychelles

article.heading: Music

list.listitem: Canterbury scene, a style of progressive rock that originated in Canterbury, England

Canterbury (band), an English alternative rock band

article.heading: Ships

list.listitem: Canterbury (ship)''Canterbury'' (ship), the ship which transported William Penn and James Logan from England to Philadelphia in 1699
HMS CanterburyHMS ''Canterbury'', several ships of the British Royal Navy

SSCanterbury19006, a South Eastern and Chatham Railway ferry

article.heading: In sports

list.listitem: Canterbury Stakes, an Australian Thoroughbred horse race
Canterbury Open, a darts tournament
Canterbury Golf Club, a golf club in Ohio

list.listitem: Chandler Canterbury(born 1998), American child actor and producer
